definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

pinyin: pu3 shi4 li4 ke4 ci4 ti3
li4 shi4 li4 ke4 ci4 ti3

sentences.english: Rocky Mountain spotted fever is a rickettsial disease that occurs in dogs and humans.
sentences.chinese: 落基山斑疹熱是一種人犬共患的立克次體病。

sentences.english: Recently, the emerging rickettsioses have become the health concern worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，新發立克次體病已成爲世界性關注的疾病。

sentences.english: However it was antigenically distinct from other species of SFG rickettsiae.
sentences.chinese: 明顯不同於其它種班點熱羣立克次體。
